purpose: Local business landmarks for authentic location-based content

landmarks.name: Knoxville Entrepreneur Center
landmarks.description: Collaborative community supporting entrepreneurs since 2013

landmarks.name: Tennessee Small Business Development Center
landmarks.description: Provides no-cost consulting and training solutions for small businesses

landmarks.name: Knoxville Chamber of Commerce
landmarks.description: Serves 2,200+ member businesses driving regional economic prosperity

landmarks.name: Farragut West Knox Chamber of Commerce
landmarks.description: Strengthens business opportunities through relationships and education

landmarks.name: Downtown Knoxville Central Business District
landmarks.description: 0.67 square mile area with Plaza Tower and Riverview Tower

landmarks.name: Downtown Knoxville Alliance
landmarks.description: Central Business Improvement District formed in 1993

landmarks.name: The Old City
landmarks.description: Historic business district with locally-owned businesses

landmarks.name: 3 Creek Industrial Park
landmarks.description: Light industrial park with easy access to I-40 and I-75

landmarks.name: Third Creek Industrial Park
landmarks.description: Located at intersection of I-75 and I-40

landmarks.name: Sherlake Industrial Park
landmarks.description: Preeminent warehouse location between Parkside Drive and Kingston Pike

landmarks.name: Forks of the River Industrial Park
landmarks.description: Major industrial park in the 37914 ZIP code area

landmarks.name: Cedar Bluff Business Corridor
landmarks.description: Primary retail and business corridor along Kingston Pike near I-40/I-75

landmarks.name: World's Fair Park
landmarks.description: Home to Knoxville Convention Center and the iconic Sunsphere

landmarks.name: Nashville Entrepreneur Center
landmarks.description: Fosters innovation by turning ideas into reality

landmarks.name: Tennessee Small Business Development Center
landmarks.description: Provides high-quality consulting and training for businesses

landmarks.name: TSU Business Incubation Center
landmarks.description: 28 office spaces offering unique business ecosystem for startups

landmarks.name: Nashville Area Chamber of Commerce
landmarks.description: Middle Tennessee's largest business federation serving 2,000+ businesses since 1847

landmarks.name: Tennessee Chamber of Commerce & Industry
landmarks.description: Unified voice of business and premier advocacy organization

landmarks.name: Donelson-Hermitage Chamber of Commerce
landmarks.description: Connects diverse businesses in family-oriented neighborhoods

landmarks.name: Central Business Improvement District
landmarks.description: 424-acre district initiated in 1999, recently expanded in 2025

landmarks.name: The Gulch Business Improvement District
landmarks.description: Mixed-use district south of downtown Nashville

landmarks.name: The District (Broadway/2nd Ave)
landmarks.description: Historic downtown district including Broadway and Riverfront

landmarks.name: Historic Black Business District
landmarks.description: Home to Citizens Bank, the oldest continuously operating minority-owned bank in the US

landmarks.name: MetroCenter
landmarks.description: Mixed-use district with industrial parks and commercial developments

landmarks.name: Wedgewood-Houston
landmarks.description: Emerging neighborhood with industrial and creative spaces

landmarks.name: Speedway Industrial Park
landmarks.description: 1,400-acre logistics and bulk distribution park, former Nashville Superspeedway site

landmarks.name: Commerce Farms Industrial Park
landmarks.description: 145-acre development with 2.5 million sq ft, home to Bridgestone Firestone Distribution

landmarks.name: Cherry Glen Industrial Park
landmarks.description: 215 acres ready for development with lots from 10-150 acres

landmarks.name: Center 615
landmarks.description: 3-building campus offering 24/7 coworking space minutes from downtown

usage_notes.purpose: Inject these landmarks into location-based pages to make content feel locally written
examples: For Knoxville pages: 'Serving businesses near the Knoxville Chamber of Commerce and throughout the Cedar Bluff Business Corridor'
For Nashville pages: 'We work with companies in MetroCenter, The Gulch, and throughout the Central Business Improvement District'
For industrial clients: 'Supporting businesses in Third Creek Industrial Park, Sherlake Industrial Park, and Speedway Industrial Park'
For entrepreneurship content: 'Partner with startups at the Nashville Entrepreneur Center and TSU Business Incubation Center'
